original_title: Classic Albums: Tears for Fears - Songs From the Big Chair
overview: A documentary that explores the creation of the seminal, second album by Tears for Fears. Songs from the Big Chair took the gothic synth-pop foundations of the band and combined them with arena-ready anthems, leading to critical acclaim and three international hit singles, Mothers Talk, Shout and Everybody Wants to Rule the World.
title: Classic Albums: Tears for Fears - Songs From the Big Chair
